repos_data.description: Embedded key-value store for read-heavy workloads written in Go
A RocksDB compliant high performance scalable embedded key-value store
Simple key-value store abstraction and implementations for Go (Redis, Consul, etcd, bbolt, BadgerDB, LevelDB, Memcached, DynamoDB, S3, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, CockroachDB and many more)
Multi-Modal Database replacing MongoDB, Neo4J, and Elastic with 1 faster ACID solution, with NetworkX and Pandas interfaces, and bindings for C 99, C++ 17, Python 3, Java, GoLang üóÑÔ∏è
GoFreeDB is a Golang library that provides common and simple database abstractions on top of Google Sheets.
